translation: Indeed, all these are noble; however, I consider the wise man as My very Self; for, he is steadfast in mind and established in Me alone as the supreme goal.
commentary: 7.18 Generous noble? All all? Eve surely? These these? wise the wise? You but? Soul Self? Eve very? May My? Opinion opinion? established is established? He he? Hi verily? steadfastminded? Mam Me? Eve verily? Anuttamam,the supreme? Gatim goal.Commentary Are not the other three kinds of devotees dear to the Lord They are. They are all noble souls.
